body:
> Does this also reproduce with `rolling`?

Yes, it reproduces with `rolling`:
```
$ USE_BAZEL_VERSION=rolling bazelisk mod show_repo curl
Starting local Bazel server (9.0.0-pre.20250921.2) and connecting to it...
## curl@8.11.0:
load("@@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
  name = "curl+",
  urls = ["https://github.com/curl/curl/releases/download/curl-8_11_0/curl-8.11.0.tar.gz"],
  integrity = "sha256-JkU32Q5Y0rCd3cUJRLrzw45wiRUciYZxXiquqvK4EY8=",
  strip_prefix = "curl-8.11.0",
  remote_patches = {},
  remote_file_urls = {"BUILD.bazel": ["https://bcr.bazel.build/modules/curl/8.11.0/overlay/BUILD.bazel"], "MODULE.bazel": ["https://bcr.bazel.build/modules/curl/8.11.0/overlay/MODULE.bazel"]},
  remote_file_integrity = {"BUILD.bazel": "sha256-TiCLbtkWr+JtSdpbfFVkETLDou/32oMVxYirhom0grU=", "MODULE.bazel": "sha256-jGK1Dz8iuabPliehKVx5K52j+EG0Dscc3I7WGiIAcfI="},
  remote_module_file_urls = ["https://bcr.bazel.build/modules/curl/8.11.0/MODULE.bazel"],
  remote_module_file_integrity = "sha256-jGK1Dz8iuabPliehKVx5K52j+EG0Dscc3I7WGiIAcfI=",
  remote_patch_strip = 0,
)
```
If this could be a 9.x blocking issue that would be great!

rename.to: single_version_override() drops patch_cmds if no patches are given

issue.title: single_version_override() now accepts patch_cmds with no patches

labels.name: team-ExternalDeps
labels.description: External dependency handling, remote repositiories, WORKSPACE file.

repository.name: bazel
repository.description: a fast, scalable, multi-language and extensible build system

issue.body:
Previously, single_version_override() would only include its patch_cmds attribute in a repo rule if the patches attribute was nonempty.

Many thanks to @fmeum for identifying the location of the bug.

Fixes #27225

issue.title: [8.5.0] single_version_override() now accepts patch_cmds with no patches

labels.name: team-ExternalDeps
labels.description: External dependency handling, remote repositiories, WORKSPACE file.

repository.name: bazel
repository.description: a fast, scalable, multi-language and extensible build system

issue.body:
Previously, single_version_override() would only include its patch_cmds attribute in a repo rule if the patches attribute was nonempty.

Many thanks to @fmeum for identifying the location of the bug.

Fixes #27225

Closes #27230.

body:
A fix for this issue has been included in[Bazel 7.7.0 RC2](https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/releases/tag/7.7.0rc2). Please test out the release candidate and report any issues as soon as possible.
If you're using Bazelisk, you can point to the latest RC by setting USE_BAZEL_VERSION=7.7.0rc2. Thanks!
